SSG_Tools.Viewers.Controls
Class AltAzController

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  SSG_Tools.Viewers.Controls.AltAzController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class AltAzController
extends javax.swing.JPanel

An AltAzController object controls the Observers position for one or more 3D panel objects by allowing the user to specify their position relative to the view reference point. The position is specified by sliders controlling the altitude angle, azimuth angle and distance to the view reference point.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

AltAzController

public AltAzController(JoglPanel my_panel)
Construct a controller with default values for the viewer position and distance range, for the specified panel.

Parameters:
my_panel - The JoglPanel that this controller will handle

AltAzController

public AltAzController(JoglPanel my_panel,
                       float altitude,
                       float azimuth,
                       float min_distance,
                       float max_distance,
                       float distance)
Construct a controller with specified values for the viewer position.

Parameters:
my_panel - The JoglPanel that this controller will handle
altitude - The initial altitude angle from the VRP to the COP in degrees.
azimuth - The initial azimuth angle from the VRP to the COP in degrees.
min_distance - The minimum distance on the distace slider.
max_distance - The maximum distance on the distace slider.
distance - The initial distance from the VRP to the COP.

setCOP

public void setCOP(Vector3D cop)
Set the observer's position (i.e. the Center of Projection ) for this view. The view reference point will be adjusted as well to keep the same view direction.

Parameters:
cop - The new vector to use for the observer's position.

setVRP

public void setVRP(Vector3D vrp)
Set the point the observer is looking at (i.e. the View Reference Point ) for this view. The center of projection will be adjusted as well to keep the same view direction.

Parameters:
vrp - The new vector to use for the point the observer is looking at.

setPerspective

public void setPerspective(boolean perspective_flag)
Set the projection type for this view.

Parameters:
perspective_flag - If true, make this a perspective projection, otherwise make it an orthographic projection.
